metadata.use_case: Variations in hospital episode (inpatient) with a main diagnosis ('main_diagnosis_cd') of hip fracture
metadata.document: Data model specification documenting both individual-level data required to respond to the three (3) research questions related to the hip fracture persona in ICCONIC

authors.name: Estupiñán-Romero, Francisco
authors.affiliation: Instituto Aragónes de Ciencias de la Salud

authors.name: Martínez-Lizaga, Natalia
authors.affiliation: Instituto Aragónes de Ciencias de la Salud

authors.name: Sawaya, Tania
authors.affiliation: Brown University School of Public Health

authors.name: Wei, Jinru
authors.affiliation: Brown University School of Public Health

authors.affiliation: Brown University School of Public Health

authors.name: Bernal-Delgado, Enrique
authors.affiliation: Instituto Aragónes de Ciencias de la Salud

metadata.description: Data model specification documenting both individual-level data required to respond to the three (3) research questions related to the hip fracture persona in ICCONIC. The data model specification includes the cohort definition (shared across the 3 studies), individual-level model specification for each of the 3 studies including data dictionaries and crosswalks for semantic interoperable definition of certain variables (i.e. socioeconomic groups, clinical conditions and comorbidities - (def)). See below some of the conventions used to document this data model
metadata.notes:
0.0.1	First iteration of the common data model specification. Entity and node description based on a previous common data specification model for the study of the asociation of time to hip fracture with increased risk of mortality 
1.0.0	First complete common data model with cohort definition specification including 'main_diagnosis_cd' crosswalks and variable level data dictionary and icd-9-mc/icd-10-mc crosswalks. Socioeconomic variables at the individual level ( 'def_soecon_lvl_cd', 'def_deprivation_lvl_cd') still pending further definition. Variable 'elixhauser_index_nm' pending drop out decision or further specification.
1.1.0	Deleted 'deprivation_lvl_cd' and 'elixhauser_index_nm' vars. Responded and resolved all comments from participant partners
1.1.1	Updated 'liver_disease_bl' crosswalk definition as Reijo identified it was wrong (it was identical to 'inflamatory_bowel_disease_bl' definition)
1.1.3	Updated 'anesthesia_type_cd' variable definition to distinguish between 'analgesi
metadata.spatial_coverage: Study of all persons with a hospital episode (inpatients) with a main diagnosis ('main_diagnosis_cd') of hip fracture

cohort.name: ICCONIC hip fracture (hipfx) persona
cohort.description: A cohort including all people with a hospital episode (inpatient) with a main diagnosis ('main_diagnosis_cd') of hip fracture (hipfx)
cohort.inclusion_criteria: Any person 65 years or older with an unplanned hospital episode (inpatient) with a main diagnosis  ('main_diagnosis_cd') of hip fracture during the study period
cohort.exclusion_criteria:
Any person under 65 years old
Multiple fractures (polytrauma)
Admission from another hospital

variables.label: patient_id
variables.description: Pseudoid of the person included in the cohort
variables.possible_data_source: Insurance registry or Health system users database
variables.observations_comments: Calculated/derived from person_id encryption or pseudonym generation algorithm

variables.label: hospitalization_episode_id
variables.description: Pseudoid of the hospitalization episode (inpatient)
variables.observations_comments: hospitalization episode here is refered as the hospital admission with a main diagnosis of hip fracture following the 'main_diagnosis_cd' definition and it entails from admission to hospital discharge.

variables.label: age_nm
variables.description: Age of the person included in the cohort (at the time of entering the cohort)
variables.possible_data_source: Insurance registry or Health system users database
variables.observations_comments: age_nm >= 65 | age_nm <= 115

variables.label: sex_cd
variables.description: Sex of the person included in the cohort (at the time of entering the cohort)
variables.possible_data_source: Insurance registry or Health system users database

variables.label: socecon_lvl_cd
variables.description: Co-payment level

variables.label: residence_area_cd
variables.description: Area of residence of the person included in the cohort (NUTS 3) (at the time of entering the cohort)
variables.transformations_from_origin: compliance with NUTS 2021 classification (Eurostat) or equivalent area regions
variables.possible_data_source: Insurance registry or Health system users database
variables.observations_comments: This can be also completed with the zip code of the residence area (pending discussion). We assume a person maintains the same residence area during the whole period of analysis. This can be also equivalent residence area regions or healthcare influence area regions for non-EU countries not included within the NUTS standard

variables.label: country_cd
variables.description: Country of residence of the person included in the cohort (at the time of entering the cohort)
variables.possible_data_source: Insurance registry or Health system users database
variables.observations_comments: We assume a person maintains the same country during the whole period of analysis

variables.label: hospital_st
variables.description: Name of the hospital of admission
variables.observations_comments: You can provide any code, name or string that helps as differentiate the hospital of admission.

variables.label: hospital_admission_dt
variables.description: Date of the hospital admission

variables.label: main_diagnosis_cd
variables.description: Code of main diagnosis at hospital admission
variables.observations_comments: see more information in 'patient_cohort_main_diagnosis_cd' tab

variables.label: surgical_procedure_bl
variables.description: Has the patient undergone a surgical procedure relevant for the study?
variables.observations_comments: Options: TRUE, FALSE

variables.label: surgical_procedure_dt
variables.description: Date of the surgical procedure

variables.label: surgical_procedure_cd
variables.description: Code of the main surgical procedure relevant for the study (i.e.pinning, parcial, total replacement)

variables.label: hospital_discharge_dt
variables.description: Date of the hospital discharge (after surgery)

variables.label: hospital_discharge_type_cd
variables.description: Type of hospital discharge
variables.transformations_from_origin: (0 = 'Home', 1 = 'Exitus', 2 = 'Long-term Hospital', 3 = 'Other acute hospital', 4 = 'Other social care (or similar institutions), 5 = 'Nursing care facility', 6 = 'Assisted home care')
variables.observations_comments: Differentiating between where the patient is discharged to (i.e., home, another hospital, long-term care, assisted home-care, nursing facility, etc.) or discharged dead

variables.label: anesthesia_type_cd
variables.description: Type of anesthesia used during the surgical procedure (i.e. locorregional or general)
variables.observations_comments: see 'def_anesthesia_cd' tab for further information on how to calculate the type of anesthesia depending on procedure codes

variables.label: icu_admission_bl
variables.description: Has been the patient admitted to intensive care unit (ICU)?
variables.observations_comments: ifelse('icu_admission_dt' != NA, TRUE, FALSE)

variables.label: icu_admission_dt
variables.description: Date of admission to intensive care unit (ICU)
variables.observations_comments: ifelse(NA, 'icu_admission_bl' == FALSE)

variables.label: icu_discharge_dt
variables.description: Date of discharge from intensive care unit (ICU)

variables.label: anticoagulant_status_bl
variables.description: Patient has an anticoagulant prescription before hip fracture hospitalization episode
variables.observations_comments: see 'def_anticoagulant_status_bl' tab for futher information on how to calculate if there is an antecedent of anticoagulant prescription. Patient is considered with 'anticoagulant_status_bl' = TRUE if it has any active prescription of an anticoagulant in the 6 months previous to the hospitalization episode

variables.label: antiaggregant_status_bl
variables.description: Patient has an antiaggregant prescripcition before hip fracture hospitalization episode
variables.observations_comments: see 'def_antiaggregant_status_bl' tab for futher information on how to calculate if there is an antecedent of antiaggregant prescription. Patient is considered with 'antiaggregant_status_bl' = TRUE if it has any active prescription of an antiaggregant in the 6 months previous to the hospitalization episode

variables.label: unplanned_readmission_7d_bl
variables.description: Have the patient had an unplanned readmission (for any cause) in the next 7 days after hospitalization
variables.observations_comments: TRUE if there is an unplanned readmission (for any cause) within the next 7 days after hospital discharge from hip fracture hospitalization episode

variables.label: unplanned_readmission_30d_bl
variables.description: Have the patient had an unplanned readmission(for any cause) in the next 30 days after hospitalization
variables.observations_comments: TRUE if there is an unplanned readmission (for any cause) within the next 30 days after hospital discharge from hip fracture hospitalization episode

variables.label: exitus_bl
variables.description: Has the patient died during the period of study (2021-12-31)?
variables.possible_data_source: Insurance registry or Health system users database or Hospital inpatient episodes (claims)
variables.observations_comments: ifelse('exitus_dt' != NA, TRUE, FALSE)

variables.label: exitus_dt
variables.description: Date of death of the person (if the person has died)
variables.possible_data_source: Insurance registry or Health system users database or Hospital inpatient episodes (claims)
variables.observations_comments: ifelse(NA, 'exitus_bl' == FALSE)

variables.label: chronic_kidney_disease_bl
variables.description: History of chronic kidney disease (comorbidity)
variables.observations_comments: see definition in 'patient_cohort_chronic_kidney_disease_bl' tab, but, as a boolean variable it can only have the values: TRUE/FALSE. Value is TRUE if any of the codes present in the above-mentioned tab are found.

variables.label: tobacco_copd_bl
variables.description: History of tobacco-related disease or chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (comorbidity)
variables.observations_comments: see definition in 'patient_cohort_tobacco_copd_bl' tab, but, as a boolean variable it can only have the values: TRUE/FALSE. Value is TRUE if any of the codes present in the above-mentioned tab are found.

variables.observations_comments: see definition in 'patient_cohort_depression_bl' tab, but, as a boolean variable it can only have the values: TRUE/FALSE. Value is TRUE if any of the codes present in the above-mentioned tab are found.

variables.label: previous_hospital_admission_bl
variables.description: Has the patient a previous admission due to any cause?
variables.observations_comments: Captures any precedent of a hospital admission due to any cause in the 6 months previous to the hospital index

variables.label: hospital_admission_type_cd
variables.description: Provenance/type hospital admission related to hospitalization episode
variables.transformations_from_origin: (0 = 'Home', 1 = 'Long-term Hospital', 2 = 'Other acute hospital', 3 = 'Other social care (or similar institutions), 4 = 'Nursing care facility', 5 = 'Assisted home care')
variables.observations_comments: From where the patient is admitted (e.g. home, other hospital, long-term care facility, home care facility, nursing home, etc.)

variables.label: patient_id
variables.description: Pseudoid of the person included in the cohort
variables.possible_data_source: Insurance registry or Health system users database or Outpatient electronic prescription registry
variables.observations_comments: Calculated/derived from person_id encryption or pseudonym generation algorithm

variables.label: prescription_atc_cd
variables.description: Outpatient prescription ATC code
variables.observations_comments: Please, pull all prescribed medications

variables.label: prescription_start_dt
variables.description: Date of initiation of outpatient prescription
variables.observations_comments: In case, only available dates are 'dispensing date' or only prescription start date is available for dispensed drugs both dates available are suitable to complete this variable

variables.label: prescription_end_dt
variables.description: Date of end of outpatient prescription
variables.observations_comments: Please, see the variable is 'Recommended'. In case you have no access or availability to prescrition termination date, you still can participate leaving this variable empty with all registries missing.

variables.label: patient_id
variables.description: Pseudoid of the person included in the cohort
variables.possible_data_source: Insurance registry or Health system users database
variables.observations_comments: Calculated/derived from person_id encryption or pseudonym generation algorithm

variables.label: post_index_hospitalization_episode_id
variables.description: Pseudoid of the hospitalization episode (inpatient)
variables.observations_comments: Any UNPLANNED hospital episode due to any cause in the next year (12 months) after the index hospital episode due to hip fracture. This configures a long-form table

variables.label: post_index_hospital_admission_dt
variables.description: Date of the hospital admission
variables.observations_comments: hospital admission date here is to admissions up to one year (12 months) after 'hospital_discharge_dt' of the entity patient_cohort. This configures a long-form table

variables.label: post_index_main_diagnosis_cd
variables.description: Code of main diagnosis at hospital admissions

variables.label: post_index_hospital_discharge_dt
variables.description: Date of the hospital discharge (after surgery)
